channel.title: How do i add ip changer
channel.description:
How do i add a IP changer to my client?
I want to know this because i downloaded a client a source that go together. I can logon using the client but no one else can. How do i make it so my client connects to my server?

item.title: How do i add ip changer
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“njr99, post:11, topic:259756”]k thanks so much[/quote]np anytime

Read full topic

^^^that is my server IP

Do i need to put it twice?[/quote]yes then replace that localhost with your ip

item.title: How do i add ip changer
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“njr99, post:5, topic:259756”]i did find a 127.0.0.1 in my client.java and i changed that to my server ip, but did i change my EGUI.java to the right thing?

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;\

wat client are you using?

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“catko.no-ip.org”, “localhost”, “43594”
});
}
}[/code][/quote] well wat server are you using?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 08:58:58 am[/size][hr]well up there i think its because you see where localhost is its only letting you on because of that so change that to your ip and then compile and done:)hope it works

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add ip changer

item.title: How do i add ip changer
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

i did find a 127.0.0.1 in my client.java and i changed that to my server ip, but did i change my EGUI.java to the right thing?

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;\

wat client are you using?

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“catko.no-ip.org”, “localhost”, “43594”
});
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add ip changer

item.title: How do i add ip changer
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“njr99, post:3, topic:259756”][code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;\

wat client are you using?

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“catko.no-ip.org”, “localhost”, “43594”
});
}
}
[/code]

That is my EGUI.java there was no 127.0.0.1 it just had:

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“”, “”, “”
});
}
}
[/code][/quote]

Read full topic

That is my EGUI.java there was no 127.0.0.1 it just had:

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;

import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

I want to know this because i downloaded a client a source that go together. I can logon using the client but no one else can. How do i make it so my client connects to my server?[/quote]go to egui.java of the client and search for 127.0.0.1 and change those to your ip compile the server then there.
